Name: API Connector
What/Why?: Automatically runs GraphQL queries to update the Council Leaderboard (and in turn the Community Roadmap)

Name: Zapier - unused
What/Why?: Takes proposals and forum threads from the Council Leaderboard and populates Notion with them

Name: n8n
What/Why?: allows for custom workflows/automation with a high degree of flexibility. Allows for graphql queries and Notion integration. Can be self-hosted
